articles.description: Men's world number 6 Stefanos Tsitsipas played a birthday prank on Nick Kyrgios, who turned 25 on Monday, by posting a social media picture in which he can be seen holding up a cardboard sign that said “Call me” and listed a cell phone number.
articles.content:
Stefanos Tsitsipas sent his tennis mate Nick Kyrgios a special 25th birthday greeting. Unfortunately for Kyrgios, it contained too much information.

articles.title: Tokyo Olympics 2021 | Japan would ‘scrap’ Games if not held next year, says Mori - The Hindu
articles.description: The International Olympic Committee and the Japanese government last month postponed the Games until July 2021 because of the impact of the coronavirus outbreak.

Tokyo 2020 president Yoshiro Mori said that the Olympic Games, already postponed to 2021, would be scrapped if it could not take place then, according to an interview published on Tuesday.
